example.parse: (TOP (S-ADV (VP (ADJ.VN+NSUFF_MASC_PL_ACC راجين) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (NP-OBJ (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC الاطلاع)) (CONJ و) (NP (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC نشر) (NP (NP (DEM_PRON_MS هذا)) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN التوضيح)))) (PP (PREP في) (NP (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN صحيفت) (NP (POSS_PRON_2MP كم))) (ADJP (DET+ADJ+CASE_DEF_GEN الغراء))))))) (PUNC .)))

arg.g: to see this clarifying and and then publish it in Your respected newspaper.

example.arg: الاطلاع ونشر هذا التوضيح في صحيفتكم الغراء
